attributes.action: Re-Name the M25 "The Chuck Norris Express Way"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chuck Norris is an absolute legend and should rightly be recognised by the UK for the excellent work he has done in the world of cinema in bringing such delights as "Lone Wolf McQuade" and "Delta Force" to the silver screen.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
